title: Barry Williams (rugby union)
text:
Barry Hugh Williams (born 6 January 1974 in <a href="Carmarthen">Carmarthen</a>, <a href="Carmarthenshire">Carmarthenshire</a>) is a <a href="Wales">Welsh</a> international <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He played hooker. In 1997, he toured <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a> with the <a href="British%20%26amp%3B%20Irish%20Lions">British & Irish Lions</a> and at the time played club rugby for <a href="Neath%20RFC">Neath RFC</a>.
He has previously played for <a href="Llandovery%20RFC">Llandovery RFC</a>, <a href="Llanelli%20RFC">Llanelli RFC</a>, <a href="Neath%20RFC">Neath RFC</a>, <a href="Richmond%20F.C.">Richmond RFC</a>, <a href="Bristol%20Bears">Bristol</a>, <a href="Swansea%20RFC">Swansea</a> and the <a href="Ospreys%20%28rugby%20union%29">Ospreys</a> He is the current coach of Llandeilo RFC. It has been announced that he will be Head Coach at Llangennech RFC for the 2010/11 season.
